description: [MOVED] This preset has been relocated to 'base/github-actions.json'. It is now an alias
that extends the new location to preserve backwards compatibility
prBodyNotes:
---
> [!WARNING]
> #### Moved preset: `Kong/public-shared-renovate:github-actions`
>
> Your config references a deprecated preset. To prevent disruption, this file temporarily aliases to `Kong/public-shared-renovate//base/github-actions`.
>
> #### Action required
>
> Update your Renovate config to extend directly from `Kong/public-shared-renovate//base/github-actions`
>
> #### Examples
>
> Before (any of the following):
>
> ```json
> [
>   { "extends": ["Kong/public-shared-renovate:github-actions"] },
>   { "extends": ["Kong/public-shared-renovate:github-actions.json"] },
>   { "extends": ["local>Kong/public-shared-renovate:github-actions"] },
>   { "extends": ["github>Kong/public-shared-renovate:github-actions"] }
> ]
> ```
>
> After:
>
> ```json
> { "extends": ["Kong/public-shared-renovate//base/github-actions"] }
> ```
>
> #### Timeline
>
> This alias will be removed in **January 2026**.
